roleset.name: inform again
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on SMS. Relation to 'inform'.

example.name: all args
example.text: A few weeks later, Billy Dauber, flanked by Butchie Petrocelli, showed up at Pronger's business and reinformed him of The Outfit's new policy.
example.arg: Billy Dauber, flanked by Butchie Petrocelli
